body: Hi I have some questions regarding the analysis period in Ladybug. If I enter in the hours from 9-15 with a 4 (15min) time step the last item in the sunPositionInfo output displays 14:45. Does this mean that the 3pm vector isn't being calculated? Is this a bug or is this intended to work this way? Thanks [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/LXZYmTRupZ*THl8v22UWKW7jcO5o6kc2a34EPC7OypjtFe-ROFWgycGsDdOUrPKvCss4KoBlpOL903ol1cZPZ6npIy6tBtan/Ladybugquestion.JPG)
